In order to use and take return or advantage of this website or any affiliate service we might use or provide, you must read and accept the Terms of service.

By pursuing the navigation or by subscribing to any affiliate service, you confirm you have read and accepted all the conditions and obligations.

The general policy

#P2Enjoy is committed to protecting the privacy of its customers and maintaining your trust and confidence is one of our highest priorities.

To provide you with the best experience possible while using the Website, upon purchase of products from this company, upon interaction with support services, upon subscribing for any organised event and other marketing and other interactions between you and any other of our affiliates service, you may from time to time provide some personally identifiable information (‚ÄúPersonal Data‚Äù).

#P2Enjoy is committed to collect and process Personal Data only in accordance with its rights and responsibilities under the applicable laws and regulations, including the European Union‚Äôs General Data Protection Regulation (‚ÄúGDPR‚Äù).

In order to performs its operations with (not exthensive list of) customers, contractors, subscribers, business partnership and alike; #P2Enjoy might process personal data during the process of doing.

Analytics of the sites published by the company

#P2Enjoy use Umami for its analytics on theirs published websites.

Umami does not collect any personally identifiable information and all data collected is anonymous. Users cannot be identified and are never tracked across websites. All data is stored as aggregated statistics only.

The statistics being aggregated and stored are:

  • counters for each visited pages
  • counters for visitors page referrers
  • counter for name and version of the browser of the visitors used to navigate the site
  • counter for name and version of the operating system of the visitors
  • counters for each generic class of the device being used by the visitor like desktop pc, mobile phone, tablet...
  • counters for the country of the visitors: no city, no region, no street... only the country.

Statistical data is retained for as long as the referred service is available on-line and it's deleted once the service target of the analytics goes off-line.
